definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]

pinyin: ke3 ca1 xie3 ke3 bian1 cheng2 zhi1 du2 cun2 chu3 qi4
containing_words.word: 可擦寫可編程只讀存儲器

pinyin: hui1 fa1 xing4 cun2 chu3 qi4
sui2 ji1 cun2 qu3 cun2 chu3 qi4
gao1 su4 huan3 chong1 cun2 chu3 qi4

sentences.english: Thus, embodiments of a virtual local memory for a graphics processor are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，公開了圖形處理器的虛擬本地存儲器的實施例。

sentences.english: Usually the hard disk installation in the mainframe, therefore it in main memory.
sentences.chinese: 通常硬盤安裝在主機箱內，因此它於主存儲器。

sentences.english: Nonvolatile memory retains all of the setup information through power downs.
sentences.chinese: 非易失性存儲器保留了通過電力起伏設置的所有信息。

sentences.english: Embodiments of a virtual local memory for a graphics processor are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 公開了圖形處理器的虛擬本地存儲器的實施例。

sentences.english: The invention provides a portable memorizer and a partitioned data protecting method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供一種便攜存儲器及其分區數據保護方法。

sentences.english: Each memory element can store data represented in analog or digital form.
sentences.chinese: 每個存儲器元件可存儲以模擬或數字形式表示的數據。

sentences.english: The memory may store an advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 存儲器會保存一個廣告。

sentences.english: Certainly, external memory is needed, when the computer is used.
sentences.chinese: 利用計算機求解時無疑要藉助於外存儲器。

sentences.english: The basic unit of computer memory is the byte.
sentences.chinese: 計算機存儲器的基本單位是字節。

sentences.english: A type of hard disk storage device in which the disk is hermetically sealed inside its disk drive.
sentences.chinese: 一種硬盤存儲器設備，其中盤片密封在磁盤驅動器內。

sentences.english: How to pre populate Derby in memory with tables and some data?
sentences.chinese: 如何預填充表和一些數據存儲器德比？
非易失的隨機訪問存儲器。

sentences.english: The Ozeri Touch includes built-in memory for up to 8 user profiles.
sentences.chinese: 該Ozeri觸摸內置存儲器最多8個用戶配置文件。

sentences.english: RAM can be classified as Static RAM and Dynamic random access memory.
sentences.chinese: 內存可分爲靜態存儲器和動態隨機存取記憶體。

sentences.english: For instance, too little electricity may cause the loss of data in primary storage.
sentences.chinese: 例如，電流過小，可能造成主存儲器中的數據丟失。

sentences.english: In main storage unit of storage general use B said.
sentences.chinese: 在主存儲器中存儲單位一般用B表示。
